about_the_game:
In Lumen you take on the role of a druid seeking to cleanse an ancient fortress and stop it from spreading its corruption to the forest. 

Lumen is a third-person action-adventure with stylized pixelated graphics. You progress through the game by solving puzzles and clearing corruption. 

Companion 

You'll be accompanied by a spirit along your journey, giving you helpful tips and commenting on the environment, in a supposedly non-annoying way. 

 

Cure the land 

A corruption is draining the land of its life force and leaving only its roots and minions to inhabit the landscape. 

Find sources of corruption and destroy them to remove the corruption and bring back life that was drained from the land. 

 

Puzzles 

Solve multiple types of puzzles to access new areas. 

The game has three types of puzzles that you’ll find along your way and need to solve to finish the game. 

Crafting 

Around the world there are useful materials to make weapons and potions, to help your journey. 

At the moment the game has two melee weapons and two ranged weapons. And the ranged weapon needs arrows to shoot. 

Fighting 

Third person real-time combat with melee and ranged attacks. 

Boss fight 

At the end you’ll face off with the source of the corruption. Evil mage that has encased their soul into a skeletal statue. 

Lore 

On your adventure you’ll find the story of the world in books and dialog telling the rich history of the land.  

Music 

Lumen has a lot of ambiance, and adaptive music. 

Thank you for reading 

This is a school project that was made in about 3 months, and the group will disband after publishing. 

 
One of our group members has stated they will potentially continue making updates.
